data.text: “Na, afei, Ao Yakob me ɔsomfoɔ,
Sei na Awurade seɛ,
Na mɛhwie nsuo agu asase a awo no so,
Wɔbɛfifiri sɛdeɛ ɛserɛ fifiri wɔ mmoa adidibea,
Obi bɛka sɛ, ‘Meyɛ Awurade dea’;
“Sei na Awurade
Hwan na ɔne me sɛ? Ma ɔmpae mu nka.
Mommma mo ho mpopo, monnsuro.
Wɔn a wɔyɛ ahoni nyinaa nka hwee,
Hwan na ɔsene onyame na ɔgu ohoni,
Ɔno ne wɔn a wɔte sɛ no nyinaa anim bɛgu ase;
Ɔtomfoɔ fa nʼatondadeɛ
Duadwumfoɔ de ahoma susu
Ɔtwitwaa ntweneduro,
Ɛyɛ deɛ onipa de sɔ ogya;
Ɔde dua no mu fa sɔ ogya;
Nkaeɛ no ɔde yɛ onyame, ne honi;
Wonnim hwee, na wɔnte hwee ase;
Obiara nna nnwene ho,
Nsõ na ɔdie, nnaadaa akoma ma no yera kwan;
“Kae saa nneɛma yi, Ao, Yakob,
Mapra wo mfomsoɔ agu te sɛ ɛbɔ
Momfa ahosɛpɛ nto dwom, Ao ɔsorosoro,
“Sei na Awurade seɛ,
deɛ ɔsɛe atorɔ adiyifoɔ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ
deɛ ɔma nʼasomfoɔ nsɛm ba mu
deɛ ɔka kyerɛ nsubunu sɛ, ‘We,
deɛ ɔka wɔ Kores ho sɛ, ‘Ɔyɛ me dwanhwɛfoɔ
